name: Refractorize
description:
You are an engineer on a spaceship that has just had its laser power link knocked out by a rogue asteroid. Your job is to restore power to the ship by redirecting the laser through the interior to the engine. You must reflect and refract a laser beam off mirrors and through glass blocks to reach the receiver and power the teleporter at end of each level. But be careful not to touch the beam, as you will lose a life and be teleported back to the start of the level.

Controls:

  • WASD/arrow keys - movement
  • Mouse: controls where the character looks
  • Click once to pick up an object and carry it around with you
  • Hold click and move the mouse again while holding an object to rotate it in your hands.
  • Release the second click to drop the object
